code: import React from"react";import{Automotivetint}from"../autotint/Automotivetint";import{services}from"../../components/service-card-component/services";import{Button}from"../../components/button-component/button";import"./services-page.styles.css";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export var Services=function Services(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"services-page-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"page-header",children:"OUR SERVICES"}),services.map(function(service){var id=service.id,serviceName=service.serviceName,img=service.img,description=service.description,simulator=service.simulator,link=service.link;var btnTxt=function btnTxt(name){if(name==="Home & Office Tint"||name==="Advertising Wraps")return"CALCULATOR";if(name==="Automotive Tint"||name==="Paint Protection Film")return"SIMULATOR";if(name==="Powersports")return"DESIGNER";};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"service-div autotint-div",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"text-side-div",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"name-service",children:serviceName}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"service-description",children:description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"buttons-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{id:id,options:{text:"LEARN MORE",className:"button btn-learn",link:link}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{options:{link:simulator,text:btnTxt(serviceName),className:"button btn-simulator"}})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"service-img",src:img,alt:service.name})]},id);})]});};
